comments:
Install platform runtime, jdt runtime, pde runtime.

1) Create plugin project
2) Create extension point
3) Select the extention point scheme in the package explorer
4) PDE Tools-> Preview Reference Document

You get the following nullpointer exception because the
org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.builders.SchemaTransformer.getSchemaCssURL
is trying to resolve the schema.css which is in org.eclipse.platform.isv.doc and that isn't present in any of the runtime downloads. So the pde has an implicit dependency on the SDK builds. Basically it isn't possible to use only the eclipse runtime downloads to develop plugins without errors.


java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.builders.SchemaTransformer.getSchemaCssURL(SchemaTransformer.java:77)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.builders.SchemaTransformer.printStyles(SchemaTransformer.java:98)

	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.builders.SchemaTransformer.transform(SchemaTransformer.java:57)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.builders.SchemaTransformer.transform(SchemaTransformer.java:49)

We now keep a copy of book.css/schema.css in pde.core to be used as last resort if the platform.doc.isv is missing.
